expensesApp.title: Expenses App
expensesApp.subtitle: Personal Finance Platform
expensesApp.description: A comprehensive expense tracking web application built with Next.js 14 and TypeScript, featuring real-time balance calculations and intelligent expense categorization. Users can manage both cash and card transactions, set up projected expenses for better financial planning, and get instant insights through an intuitive dashboard.
